FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 14-08-2024 10:55:26   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17690859 


ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL

MV

 IOANNIS THEO  , 57K DWT/10 BLT, OPEN SURABAYA 23-25 AUG 2024    
BOD ABOUT 600 MT VLSFO, 70 MT LSMGO

MV  SPAR CANIS  , 53K DWT/06 BLT,OPEN GUANGZHOU EX DD - 22 - 26 AUG 2024                        
RS3
GRAIN CLEAN, EX DD
TRY ANY INCLUDING BH AND SP



VESSEL DESCRIPTION:


M/V IOANNIS THEO

TYPE: BULK CARRIER

FLAG: MARSHALL ISLANDS

BUILT: AUGUST 2010

CLASS: NKK

IMO NO: 9565170

P+I CLUB: BRITANNIA STEAM SHIP INSURANCE ASSOCIATION LIMITED

INTERNATIONAL GRT/NRT: 32983MTS / 19191MTS

SUMMER DWAT / DRAFT / TPC: 56,735.0MT / 12.80M / 58.80MT

L.O.A: 189.99M / BEAM: 32.26M

GRAIN CAPACITY: 71,634.10CBM

GEAR: ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC CRANES 4 X SWL 30MT

GRABS: 4 UNITS PEINER RADIO CONTROLLED SINGLE ROPE GRABS

 

CONSUMPTIONS

SPEED AND CONSUMPTION CLAIM ARE UP TO GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS BEAUFORT FORCE 4, SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT UP TO 1.25M WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENTS AND THE EFFECT OF THE POSITIVE CURRENTS NOT TO BE DEBITED AGAINST THE VESSEL. A GOOD WEATHER DAY IS DEFINED 24 HOURS CONSECUTIVE GOOD WEATHER ONLY. “ABOUT” MEANS HAVING AN ALLOWANCE OF -0,5KNOT ON SPEED AND +5% ON BUNKERS CONSUMPTION ONLY.

 

EPL SYSTEM HAS BEEN INSTALLED AS PER MARPOL ANNEX VI

 

LADEN AT SEA (PER 24 HOURS)

ABT 12.80 KNOTS AT ABT 28.00MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

ABT 12.50 KNOTS AT ABT 27.00MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

ABT 12.00 KNOTS AT ABT 26.00MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

ABT 11.00 KNOTS AT ABT 24.50MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

 

BALLAST AT SEA (PER 24 HOURS)

ABT 13.00 KNOTS AT ABT 28.50 MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

ABT 12.50 KNOTS AT ABT 26.50 MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

ABT 12.00 KNOTS AT ABT 25.50 MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

ABT 11.00 KNOTS AT ABT 24.00 MT VLSFO 380CST + ABT 0.3MT LSMGO

 

PORT CONSUMPTION IDLE: ABT VLSFO 4.2MT

WHEN CRANES:

2 CRANES WORKING 24 HRS: ABT VLSFO 5.4MT

4 CRANES WORKING 24 HRS: ABT VLSFO 6.6MT

ADA

 

 

M/V SPAR CANIS

BUILT 2006 /CHENGXI/NORWEGIAN FLAG/SDBC

53,000 MT DWAT ON 12,54 SSW TPC 57,3

LOA/BEAM: 190,00 MTR / 32,26 MTR

5 HOLDS/5 HATCHES

GRAIN/BALE 65,752/

CRANES 4X36 MT GRABS 4X13CBM

GRT/NRT 32,474/17,790

CLASS: NK

CO2 FITTED IN HOLDS

ABT 12 LADEN/12,5 BALLAST ON ABT 22,0 MT VLSFO AND ABT 0,1 MT MGO

PORT WORKING/IDLE: ABT 5,5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0,1 MT MGO

                                               ABT IDLE: 2,5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0,1 MT MGO

 

STATE VESSEL'S SPEED: UP TO BEAUFORT SCALE FORCE 4/DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3

(WIND 0-16KNOTS // WAVE & SWELL HEIGHT OF  0-1,25 M) WITH NO ADVERSE

CURRENT AND NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL. POSITIVE CURRENTS NOT TO

BE DEBITED FROM VESSEL’S SPEED IN SPEED/CONSUMPTION CALCULATIONS.

ABOUT TO MEAN +/- 0.5 KNOTS AND +/- 5% ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION. VSL HAS

THE LIBERTY OF USING EXTRA LSMGO DISTILLATE AT START/STOP SWITCH

GENERATOR ENGINE AT SEA, WHEN ENTERING/LEAVING PORT/BERTHS/ANCHORAGES,

MANOEUVRING IN SHALLOW/NARROW WATERS, WHEN NAVIGATING IN FOG, CANALS,

ESTUARIES, RIVERS, BOILER MAINTENANCE, FIRE IGNITION AND AT OTHER LIMITED

OCCASIONS AND HAS LIBERTY OF USING EXTRA FUEL WHILE BALLAST EXCHANGE

OPERATIONS.

 

ALL DETLS ABT


PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,

Tonnage Desk:
